title: 07/08/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 07/08/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Doug Gottlieb filling in for Colin today, explains how Chris Paul is an old iPhone, he’s great right now but may breakdown in the near future. Doug Pederson and the Eagles weighed the Pros/Cons with Carson Wentz choosing a back up over their Quarterback. Plus, in “Best For Last” Doug shines a much needed light on the steroid era in Major League Baseball!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
